version_description: - Iphone 6, Iphone 6 plus screen resolution fixed.

Sincere apologies to all users whose gaming progress got lost.
Please, let the game access the Game Center to activate the function of saving progress in the Cloud in order to prevent such problems in the future!

In this game version each user whose saves got lost will receive 100 000 coins and lifelong VIP status turning all in-game ads off, adding fuel unlimited and increasing whole profit after completion of the missions by 25%.

Thanks for staying with us,
Sigma Team.

- Big role - playing system with branched structure of skills and abilities. Pass the missions, accumulate experience and upgrade your character with a number of various skills!
- New various weapons.
- New monsters - more dangerous, more bloodthirsty!
- New game character - Killer Lady.

- Possibility to use boosters and buy ammo on the battlefield directly.

- Minor changes and improvements.

Attention!
High command of planet Earth began total modification of current armament system in order to fight the infected more effectively.
All the plants started production of new generation weapons, many of them equipped with unique modules providing useful features to increase the chance to win.
Special containers with all necessary equipment were introduced to speed up new weapon delivery.
